scripts.stop: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No server running on port 3000'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios:run: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:android:run: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
